name: Durin
base skill: When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, self Morale recovered per hour -0.1, but restores +0.2 Morale per hour to all Operators assigned to that Dormitory (Only the strongest effect of this type takes place)

When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, self Morale recovered per hour -0.1, but restores +0.25 Morale per hour to all Operators assigned to that Dormitory (Only the strongest effect of this type takes place)
